title: The Days the Prophet (pbuh) Fasted Optionally - Dr Zakir Naik
transcript: in AB da number three Hadith number 2437 that the wives of the Prophet said the prophet fasted during the first nine days of and he fasted during Ashura and three days every month the first Monday and two thday we come to know from this Hadith that the prophet fasted the first n days of the that means besides the 9th of the day of it is must it is Sunnah to fast all the first n days of if someone say I cannot then at least fast besides ARA Monday and Thurday but the best is fasting all the first n days of because these are the best days of the year
